comment: Take her! She is the best teacher. She is funny as well. She does a great job teaching french. Can't say enough how happy I am that i got her as my french teacher. Take her!!
OUI OUI take the course. Madame Bray is part time so you have to pay attention to her office hours if you want one on one time. Test require moderate study time and writing in french is important.

Love her. Not an 'easy' professor, but she does her job very well. Grade consists of tests (4), Supersite homework throughout, writing assignments (3), a Cocktail Party that is mandatory, and a few extra assignments here and there. You do need to buy the book for her class. There is not better French professor at KSU. Take her if you can.

Madame Bray is a very nice lady. I did not have a problem getting an A in French 1102. She is fair and flexible if issues arise on the Supersite or elsewhere. Her lessons are mostly clear, but you will need the book to learn to spell what she is saying in French. I would definitely recommend her.

Ms. Bray is a Good Teacher. However, a lot was missed because she would talk in French the whole class period. This is an 1102 class French is still new to us. Wasn't clear on assignments on Supersite. The way she taught made the class worth while. And she was willing to help if you needed it. Graded harsh at times.

Is nice & lenient. A lot of assignments including online HW, papers, the cocktail party, an oral presentation, tests, & both a written & oral final. Very "question & answer" oriented teaching style. Changed the due dates of a lot of assignments because of the snow days, but was very lenient about turning things in late.
Easy A if you study and participate in class. She is one of the best professors at Kennesaw.
Very nice lady. Easy A if you study.

Great teacher--would say the best French prof. I have had so far.  Thorough, clear--loves what she teaches as well as her students.  Bonus of being able to explain things in French & clearly in English if necessary.  You get the grade you earn which is another reason I love love love her!!
Fantastic teacher! Very helpful. Espaces supersite is a great tool to help learn but practicing exercises. She is fair and a very nice woman. Definitely recommend taking her class!

Madam Bray is a fantastic teacher. I am an older learner returning to school & she was extremely supportive.  She gives you the opportunity to succeed if you apply yourself.  It's not a hard class but you had to work/study to get a good grade, which is what school is all about.  I recommend her and am taking her for the next course in the fall.
She is a really good teacher.2001 is a hard class but you will learn a lot in the class that will help you in 2002.She is always willing to help and is very enthuastic about the class she's teaching.

Prof Bray is excellent!! I highly recommend her as a french teacher.  Patient and gives plenty of practice sheets, and additional exercises.  Go to class and participate. Do your homework - take advantage of the extra credit.  She's great!!

This is the most helpful professor I've ever had; she really wants her students to do well. There are a lot of quizzes and the work load was heavy but she is very understanding and patient and her style was engaging and effective. By far the nicest and most caring professor I know. I highly recommend her for anyone taking french.

Prof. Bray is my favorite person in the world! She's extremely helpful and really wants her students to do well. She gives a ton of homework, practice sheets, and quizzes, so you have to stay sharp and do your work! It's worth is; you'll learn a lot. I wish I could take her for every French class!

Professor Bray has a ton of energy! She is a hard teacher, but you will know a lot of vocab when you're done with her class. She's very big on speaking the language in class. She's definitely pulling for her students, but don't expect this class to be easy. She expects you to practice on your own. Don't take this class unless you're willing to work
